name: Reflection (itch) (ArtlineSt)
description:
REFLECTION

Reflection is an exciting platform game where you have to move forward by solving puzzles in two worlds - real and reflected. The reflected world reflects some things... in a different way, and it prevents you from going further.

---Peculiarities---
  1. 1 Bit graphic
  2. 6 levels
  3. Unique mechanics
---Basic mechanics---

Pass into the reflected world with the help of windows

Rotate the level to solve puzzles
